name: EPIC SOFTWARE [BTG - Inappropriate Attempt]
description: This rule looks for inappropriate EPIC break-the-glass (BTG) attempts. Break-the-glass (BTG) is an Epic feature that allows users to gain access to restricted patient records. If this rule triggers an alert, verify the user access permissions.

name: EPIC SOFTWARE [Multiple BTG Attempts]
description: This rule looks for EPIC multiple break-the-glass (BTG) attempts by a single user in a short period of time.
